faqs.question: What languages are used in frontend development?
What are popular frontend frameworks?
faqs.answer: Angular JS ,React JS , NEXT JS, VUE JS

faqs.question: What is responsivee design?
faqs.answer: Responsive design refers to the approach in which our web app can be view in any device flexibly

faqs.question: What is DOM?
faqs.answer: DOM refers to the Document Object Model
